thread.title: GoDaddy Ranks No. 1 In .IN Domain Name Market Share
thread.title_full: GoDaddy Ranks No. 1 In .IN Domain Name Market Share | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: GoDaddy Ranks No. 1 In .IN Domain Name Market Share
text:
GoDaddy, the world’s largest technology provider dedicated to small businesses, today announced that it is now number one in .IN domain name market share, according to the National Internet Exchange of India (NiXi) .IN is India’s Country Code Top Level domain (ccTLD) on the Internet, and the leading domain name in India, enabling brands, companies and individuals to establish a distinct Indian identity online. The domain name is seeing significant uptake among individuals and businesses in India and worldwide, with over 1.7 million websites [1] around the world ending in .IN.
“IN Registry congratulates GoDaddy for emerging as the number one registrar for .IN domain names with over 33% of the total market share. Unlike other domains, .IN is a unique symbol of India and has a crucial role in projecting the Indian presence in the cyber space. We are delighted that GoDaddy is helping individuals and businesses achieve a distinct Indian identity by making registrations of .IN domains fast, easy and affordable,” said Dr. Govind, CEO, NIXI.
“India is an important market for GoDaddy and we are proud to become the number one domain registrar of .IN domain names. We believe that by enabling greater adoption of .IN domain names, we can aid in further accelerating Internet adoption and make the Web relevant for millions of Indian consumers and business owners,” said Rajiv Sodhi, Vice President and Managing Director, GoDaddy India and Australia. “This milestone is a testament towards our dedicated efforts in enabling small businesses and individuals in building an impactful online identity.”
GoDaddy’s position as the number one domain registrar for .IN demonstrates how more and more small businesses in India are partnering with GoDaddy to build an effective online presence. .IN immediately implies an association with ‘India’ or ‘Indian’ for people around the world. GoDaddy is fueling demand for .IN domain names by educating individuals and small business owners on its importance and through its robust partner and reseller ecosystem.
GoDaddy offers a suite of online products for small businesses in India. GoDaddy combines its products with award-winning customer care to help empower small business owners, and entrepreneurs in India, to easily start, confidently grow and successfully run their own ventures. This includes finding the perfect domain name, website creation and hosting, online marketing, and productivity tools.
To register a new .IN domain name through GoDaddy, visit: in.godaddy.com or call GoDaddy’s award winning 24/7 customer care 24/7 Support 040-49187600 24/7 Support 040-49187600 on 040-49187600
To learn how GoDaddy can help your small business, visit: in.godaddy.com

About GoDaddy
GoDaddy’s mission is to radically shift the global economy toward small businesses by empowering people to easily start, confidently grow and successfully run their own ventures. With approximately 13 million customers worldwide and more than 60 million domain names under management, GoDaddy gives small business owners the tools to name their idea, build a beautiful online presence, attract customers and manage their business.
